website_summaries.verdict: This beam is a good purchase for beginners who want to practice and play at home. Its foam core keeps feet from sinking into the beam, at least if you're under 100 pounds.
pros: Made of high-density, cross-linked polyethylene foam core for solid support
Covered with synthetic suede, which won't tear like vinyl and is easy to clean
cons: May not be supportive enough for older gymnasts but good for elementary-age children
May arrive with a slight odor, which will fade in time

customer_reviews.title: Love this beam!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect to practice on at home. It's low enough to practice things like back walk overs without danger of falling off and it's so easy to set up and put away.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Goldhammer

customer_reviews.title: Too slippery!
customer_reviews.text: The beam is very slippery. Its made from microfiber from what I can tell. And this makes it very hard to do any tricks safely since your feet slide right off! If it was made from a different material I would give it more stars, but my girls wont even do gymnastics on this because of this reason.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Great Beam with a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: Great for cartwheels, handstands, back walkovers, and more, this foam beam is relatively inexpensive and fun! Overtime, I did notice the beam sinking in slightly, but it didn't much affect the sturdiness of it. It is great for someone who wants to get in practice on a safe, convenient beam. I took off one star because of the slight sinking and because the outside material is so different than on a real beam. While doing cartwheels, it is easier to slip off this beam because of its material than a real one. Other than that, nice value and super fun!
customer_reviews.author: SGIC

customer_reviews.title: A beam comparable to the kind you'd find in the gym
customer_reviews.text: This beam is a nice suede material, not like most of the other beams on Amazon that are covered in a plastic-y material. Slight bend in the middle if you don't line it up before you start. Pros: Long (9 feet) - longer than most beams Folds up easily (4.5 feet) Velcro in middle Stable Grippy Cons If you touch your nose there is a slight odor (but faded after a few days) You can't ~really~ do turns on it, but you could if you really want to. ***The guitar, ruler and foot in the photo(s) are for reference purposes***
customer_reviews.author: Aglaia

customer_reviews.title: Decent beam
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent product. Ordered for my 9 year old and she loves it. She is able to practice quite a few skills on the beam. The only reason I gave it a 3star is because it is softer than a regular beam and my kid easily looses balance if she steps too close to the edge. I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: SNRS

customer_reviews.title: Twice as long as the competitor's beam
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and long enough for my 8-year-old to practice her cartwheels and walkers on; firm enough for an adult to walk on. Soft suede material is similar to competition beam. Wipes clean. Folds in half for easy storage. Provides hours of entertainment and the ability to practice skills indoors.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great product for beginners
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a beginning gymnast and has the most problems with beam. I bought this based on several good reviews stating the ease of storage and portability of the beam. I agree it is light and easily folds up in a corner. My 6 year old loves it and has a good time trying new things with it. It is an appropriate length for beginners and is flat on the floor, so a "fall" only results in a tumble. The only complaint I have is that it is somewhat soft and squishy so not a true match to a gym beam. (hehe, "gym beam")
customer_reviews.author: E. Wolf

customer_reviews.title: great for practicing!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5yr old who has been taking gymnastics for 1yr. She LOVES IT! She keeps jumping up and down saying "You're the best Mommy ever I love having a beam in our house!" She has been practicing since we received! IT is very light to carry, she can fold it and put it away on her own! It is very sturdy and is perfect for gaining confidence with forward rolls, cartwheels, handstands, leaps etc... My 2yr loves this too-it's a great start for her and she finally gets "her turn" to practice!
customer_reviews.author: momof2girls

customer_reviews.title: which is nice, because my 8 and 3 year old daughters ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 8 year-old gymnastics obsessed daughter for Christmas and it was a HUGE hit. She absolutely loves it. It comes in a 4.5 ft box and the box is very light-weight as is, obviously, the balance beam. It folds out to 9 ft. The material is firm but lightweight, which is nice, because my 8 and 3 year old daughters drag this thing around the house to perform various routines! Most popular gift this Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie H.

customer_reviews.title: My niece didn't want to use it for practice because it was super soft. I sent it back
customer_reviews.text: This felt very flimsy. My niece didn't want to use it for practice because it was super soft. I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Sdbernier

customer_reviews.title: just ok
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty good for practicing at home. Issues I found with this particular one: It's a little flexy and isn't slip proof. Also the fact that it isn't raised off the ground, makes for less balance practice.
customer_reviews.author: Bling

customer_reviews.title: Better for preschool
customer_reviews.text: Too squishy if you're gymnast has any tumbling skills. Better for preschool.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: This is my daughter's favorite Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: This is my daughter's favorite Christmas gift. I didn't expect much, since it looks like a sad little foam speedbump, but it works great. It doesn't slip or slide on top of a padded vinyl matt and it's not too soft or too firm. Overall a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: sadams1011

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is designed to do
customer_reviews.text: Does not fold. Works well for my granddaughter gymnastic training and practice
customer_reviews.author: The Gambles

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great price and exactly what we were looking for! My daughter has an actual beam but we wanted one for the floor so she can practice some skills she's too scared to practice on the real beam. It's sturdy, long for a connection if you're at that point yet and we just put two tumbling mats next to each other under it to prevent it from slipping. Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: soldiersprincess2011

customer_reviews.title: Perfect !!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 8 year old daughter, home gymnastics workouts. Her gym has same ones they use also on floor mats. I recommend this highly. Easy to fold and she can carry also.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Beam does a great job of laying there on our floor and doing ...
customer_reviews.text: Beam does a great job of laying there on our floor and doing nothing. It doesn't move, it doesn't talk back, it doesn't eat or drink... it just lays there. It's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: RP Carney

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this beam. She was on it almost all day and enjoys it. Going to help her out tremendously through her gymnastics career/ambitions.
customer_reviews.author: M Long

customer_reviews.title: As expected!
customer_reviews.text: Insanely fast shipping, good for what we need to use it for but the smell after opening it was making me sick, we had to air it out. It folds in half nicely for storage and my daughter can carry it around and open it up herself (She's 7). Since it's less intimidating than a high beam, she's more willing to try new things with it. We've only had it a couple weeks and she already did a cartwheel on it when she never tried it before ever anywhere. We had to get something for home since where we live has no gymnastics in the summer break!!!
customer_reviews.author: Laura K.

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: If you have an aspiring gymnast in your house this is really great. My daughter loves this for development and confidence building.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for traveling and keeping the kids entertained for hours!
customer_reviews.text: My daughters loves to practice gymnastics. With this beam we can put it in our car top carrier and take it with us on the road. We were able to take their gymnastic show on the road for her Grandparents, Cousins and Aunts and Uncles to see. All the kids began to show their own talents and practice. Anything that can keep that many kids entertained is worth the expense. The only thing I wish this beam had was a traveling case (we kept the plastic it came in and duck taped the seams into a makeshift carry case). If you can handle the thumping noise from the missed moves this is a great gift for any high energy kid.
customer_reviews.author: DuboisDwy

customer_reviews.title: Great beam
customer_reviews.text: Great beam for smaller child. My 3 year old granddaughter has learned a cartwheel on it. Very sturdy, good quality.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: If you have hard floors, consider a 10’ mat also
customer_reviews.text: My 9-yo daughter totally loves this!!!! Great purchase, super fast delivery. Santa was a hero on Christmas :)
customer_reviews.author: Ed from Powhatan, VA

customer_reviews.title: Not great for us
customer_reviews.text: Received in good timing but had to return. It was very flimsy/squishy. I didn't think my daughter could safely practice most of her level 3 beam routine. Went with a more expensive low beam with legs.
customer_reviews.author: Momof2

customer_reviews.title: the girls (ages 3 and 7) are able to fold and store and use this beam easily.
customer_reviews.text: This light, portable beam was/ is just the right size and height for two budding gymnastics sisters. Because space is limited in their home, the girls (ages 3 and 7) are able to fold and store and use this beam easily.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Connie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome investment
customer_reviews.text: Awesome investment. This has worked so well at home and really helped with confidence. Easy to mive, store, etc. Definitely would buy again.it does fold in half for storage, is lightweight, and soft/padded for younger kids or newbies.
customer_reviews.author: ASW

customer_reviews.title: We like this but it was definitely not as exciting as ...
customer_reviews.text: We like this but it was definitely not as exciting as I thought it would be. I should've gotten the one that is slightly higher off the ground. It's also not supportive enough for an adult or large child. We got it for my 6 year old so she could just work on balance and she likes it to practice cartwheels.
customer_reviews.author: aweigel

customer_reviews.title: Great balance beam
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really enjoys using this product because she can use it in the living room and than when she is done practicing she can fold it up and then put it away so nobody is falling over it. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Calogero

customer_reviews.title: Soft, but usable.
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it. It is a little softer than I expected, but my 9 year old can still practice her cartwheels and handstands in it.
customer_reviews.author: MissMeliss80

customer_reviews.title: ... this over a year ago and it’s still in good shape considering how brutal the kids use it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this over a year ago and it’s still in good shape considering how brutal the kids use it.
customer_reviews.author: BaShee

customer_reviews.title: Great for all ages and sizes
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old and 1.5 year old LOVE IT. We all play on it as a family with weights ranging up to 230lbs and it holds so good. GET THIS!
customer_reviews.author: tiana michelle

customer_reviews.title: Good Beam - Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This beam was sold at a very good price. It does have a rather strong plastic smell upon opening, but it fades quickly. It's solid and sturdy enough for my 70 pound gymnast. It also folds in half so that it can be stored. Also, it's purple! I am very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S. Manzino

customer_reviews.title: Easy to store
customer_reviews.text: Easy to store, does not come in box, wrapped in plastic. If it is a gift, watch out that person to receive does not open door. I think price is a bit high for what it is, but my daughter loves it, and its like the real deal.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Great practice tool
customer_reviews.text: Kid love it just what they needed for practicing jumps and cartwheels without falling off he higher beam
customer_reviews.author: LBMB

customer_reviews.title: this beam warped within 2 days after receiving it. ...
customer_reviews.text: this beam warped within 2 days after receiving it. One end of the beam now rests about 2 inches off the ground. just the last 2.5 to 3 feet of the beam seems to be 'bent'
customer_reviews.author: Peter J Pomeroy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the front room!
customer_reviews.text: We bought it last year, and is used constantly. The foam is holding up great, and is easy to store away.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: it is smaller than a real beam but it is perfect to throw down on the floor in the living ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 8 year old level 3 gymnast to practice on at home. She absolutely loves it! Obviously, it is smaller than a real beam but it is perfect to throw down on the floor in the living room to practice on. You will want a rug under it to keep it from sliding. This is the only negative that I have seen with the product (if that is even a negative because the rug acts as padding when she falls off). It is super light and folds in half for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: J Reeves

customer_reviews.title: Works well for home practice
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter uses this to practice at home and says it's working well. She used to mark the carpet with duct tape! This feels like the beam at her gymnastics class but down on the floor.
customer_reviews.author: SCD

customer_reviews.title: I was amazed and thankful as my daughter was so happy
customer_reviews.text: This was a last minute Christmas gift and the delivery date was to be after Christmas, knowing that when i ordered it, but the shipper helped to have it delivered for the holiday. I was amazed and thankful as my daughter was so happy. I gave 4 star because of the smell. The beam has been out of the package for a days, and the smell is very bad still. I wouldn't say it smells like plastic, or new car smell, it is more like a cheap "china" chemical. I love the beam and so does my daughter, but if the smell is that strong, can you only image what your young child's feet are in contact with?
customer_reviews.author: Alison

customer_reviews.title: Nice product. My 7 year old gymnastic is getting ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. My 7 year old gymnastic is getting ready for team & uses this beam at home almost daily. It lite enough for her to fold it up & put it away all by herself. It does slip a little when used on our wood floors but that's the only complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great practice beam
customer_reviews.text: This was a great tool for my budding gymnast. She uses it constantly!
customer_reviews.author: James Holland

customer_reviews.title: My 9 year old daughter can easily fold this up or lay it flat for cartwheels
customer_reviews.text: very much as advertised. My 9 year old daughter can easily fold this up or lay it flat for cartwheels. It feels like brushed swede and is comfortable to little bare feet.
customer_reviews.author: S. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: Just right! Firm but comfortable, high quality. Needed to off- gas for two weeks in sunroom though....strong chemical smell
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Mom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome beam for a variety of levels!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this beam for my niece who is 5. It arrived ahead of schedule and in great shape. She absolutely loves it. It is lightweight and easy to move/store. Coaching gymnastics in the past I can tell you that it will easily work for her level all the way up to gymnasts working on back-handsprings and back tucks. Turns are a little hard on it, but there are so many other skills you can work on that it shouldn't be a problem. I would highly recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Bauer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT PINK BEAM..
customer_reviews.text: It is a present for my 10 year old daughter. I was surprised by it being so lightweight but would be sturdy for a balance beam.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Roach

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Santa really won my kid's heart with this one, and her beam progress is amazing now that we can practice @ home. it folds, so we take it everywhere. Definitely a worthy purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: meech

customer_reviews.title: Works great for Indoor Use.
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old and 3 year old LOVE this. They have friends over and pretend to play gymnastics. It's safe and easy for them to use. I love that they can use it quickly & easily indoors! Great purchase and it met all of my expectations!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Fine for lower level gymnasts
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product for younger/lower level gymnasts. Excellent for lower level skills, but it is too squishy for things like full turns. It would also be good for more advanced skills such as back handsprings, if you have some type of mat to place it on.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for our young gymnast.
customer_reviews.text: Was the hit of my 6 year old nieces birthday party. All the kids loved walking on it. The parents were happy because it is easy to fold up and, store when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Kat M

customer_reviews.title: Very cool. The beam may be a bit too soft
customer_reviews.text: Very cool. The beam may be a bit too soft, though. But it works well for my daughter in our basement.
customer_reviews.author: K. R. Sontag

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: The balance beam itself is very nicely made, it is a bit squishy which is good because my daughter loves doing backhandspring step outs on it. The only issue is the red writing comes off if your feet are sweaty and it gets all over the beam and the feet of whoever is using it.
customer_reviews.author: Dierdre Glass

customer_reviews.title: pretty good
customer_reviews.text: This balance beam is good for the price. The only problem is it is a little to soft and you slip off the sides. I think if you want a real feeling beam you need to invest at least $200-$300. But for $85, this is good and at least gives you the size to practice cart wheels on the beam.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Hoschette

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Easy to store great for beginners. My daughter and all her friends love practicing on this bc it is low to the ground and they can gradually move to higher beam at gymnastics.
customer_reviews.author: CME

customer_reviews.title: My daughter love this. It is a great way for her ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter love this. It is a great way for her to practice her being routines without having to commit to going to the gym or purchasing a full beam for her.
customer_reviews.author: Felice Navidad

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is super excited to be able to practice on the beam at home! Its light and folds up easily. So far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids-easy folding for storage
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 6 yr old to practice. Love that it can be stored under the bed.! She is pleased and so and I. Would recommend if you have a small child who wants to practice and you have limited space.
customer_reviews.author: R. Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great beam! My daughter practices a lot with it ...
customer_reviews.text: Great beam! My daughter practices a lot with it and loves it!

customer_reviews.title: Flipping fun
customer_reviews.text: This is a great light weight beam for at home practice. Although it does slide around on hardwood floors so I will have to find a solution. Folds in half for easy storage. It was delivered quickly. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: carcam

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6 and 8 year old daughters for Christmas. They love it and I love it for its portability. It is good quality but it did have a weird smell when it came in which eventually went away.
customer_reviews.author: RKG

customer_reviews.title: granddaughter loves loves it/ and she is just turned 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: granddaughter loves loves it/ and she is just turned 4 years old.

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter really enjoys practicing her gymnastics in the living room, rather than having to wait until she gets to the gym, Well worth the money.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, light enough for our 8 year old to carry around, sturdy enough for even the older kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our grand daughter who is just starting out in gymnastics. Perfect size, folds and fist under her bed. She loves it.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses this daily!! She doesn't do gymnastics seriously but loves to play at home!! Well made and easy to put out and put away!!

customer_reviews.title: great for the kids
customer_reviews.text: this is a great product, and well made too, and I would definitely and highly recommend this product to anyone who is thinking of purchasing it.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent training aide for skill development before transferring to regulation ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent training aide for skill development before transferring to regulation beam. Compact, folds in half for easy storage when not in use.

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Daughter it uses beam every day, durable and stows easily.
customer_reviews.author: Fourday

customer_reviews.title: Great for practicing turns
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a level 4 gymnast. She loves it! Great for practicing turns, cartwheels, and overall balance. Lightweight and easy to move and store, too!
customer_reviews.author: cogs15

customer_reviews.title: Slides around too much ...
customer_reviews.text: The beam slides way too much, even with heavy gym mats under it. It also curls up if it's not stored flat on the floor; put it under a bed if you can instead of upright in a closet. The only way I could stop the sliding was by putting Velcro tape on the beam and on my floor. It's okay for cartwheels and front and back walk-overs, but not much else. The beam moves too much to practice even simple jumps. I would not re-purchase in hindsight.
customer_reviews.author: JMB1101

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my six year old daughter for Christmas and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for at home practice
customer_reviews.text: Item as described, delivered sooner than expected. This is perfect for at home practice.
customer_reviews.author: COKERRY1973

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this! It’s long and it’s not ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this! It’s long and it’s not too high to try new skills on. She likes it because if she falls off she won’t get hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Peacock

customer_reviews.title: But my grandaughter does like it and it is so easy to fold up ...
customer_reviews.text: We just decided to keep this because there was not any information in the box to send it back. But my grandaughter does like it and it is so easy to fold up and move!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Medlin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My niece has been enjoying this since she first opened the box!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Comiskey

customer_reviews.title: Little wider than standard
customer_reviews.text: Works great, folds up small! Fits under the bed and out of the way. Highly recommended for beginners and competitors.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Beron

customer_reviews.title: It arrived very quickly and I was very happy with the quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for Christmas. It arrived very quickly and I was very happy with the quality. My daughter enjoys practicing basic skills- handstands, cartwheels, spins and jumps on it. It is soft, and my daughter said some skills are a little more difficult because of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for the new gymnast, can be folded for storage.

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome! Folds in half to store behind couch or ...
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome! Folds in half to store behind couch or under a bed. This is great for gymnastics practice at home!

customer_reviews.text: My daughter has not willingly gotten off of this since we gave it to her. If she could eat and sleep on it she would. And if she could eat and sleep on it while cartwheeling and flipping on it she would. Grand slam for my family.

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old daughter loves this beam! It's very light weight, so she can move it, and love that it folds up. I highly recommend this! I feel like the price was reasonable as well.

customer_reviews.title: It's soft and stable and folds in half for easy storage. It doesn't take up any room and ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this beam and so do I. It's soft and stable and folds in half for easy storage. It doesn't take up any room and I'm very happy with this product.

customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this piece! It is soft so we don't have to worry as much about major injury! Lol

customer_reviews.title: It has been getting a lot of use and still looks like new. Her much larger older brother even walks ...
customer_reviews.text: My Granddaughter loves it. She carries it with her when she comes to visit on weekends. It has been getting a lot of use and still looks like new. Her much larger older brother even walks on it and it has not broken down or changed it's shape.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very portable!
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for drills, it would be better if it was a bit taller, it's just barely off the ground. It folds and puts away very easily, we can even put it in the trunk and take it places.
customer_reviews.author: Allyson James

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loves this and the fact that it folds easily makes storage a breeze. I have recommended this to others.

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this for my 9 year old granddaughter that ...

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy enough and can be folded for easy storage
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old daughter loves it! Sturdy enough and can be folded for easy storage.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great product- my daughter uses it everyday - folds easily for storage and is light enough for her to set up on her own

customer_reviews.title: Not really like a beam.
customer_reviews.text: While this product is useable; it is made of a soft pliable type of material. Not perfect for a gymnast trying to master skills. It is useable for basic skills that my 8 year old is practicing.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Krauth

customer_reviews.title: Love it. It is so light and easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It is so light and easy to put away. My beginner gymnast practices on it as soon as she comes home from school.

customer_reviews.title: Good product, love that it folds for storage
customer_reviews.text: Good product, love that it folds for storage. Great practice. We use it with a 10' mat, my daughter was able to do cartwheels on it from day one!
customer_reviews.author: Janice Mangeri

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Product. My 8 year old daughter uses it everyday to practice new skills.
customer_reviews.author: Angela R. Sarver

customer_reviews.title: It is sturdy yet lightweight and easy for her to move around
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old received this as a Christmas present and loves it! It is sturdy yet lightweight and easy for her to move around.
customer_reviews.author: ekck12

customer_reviews.title: Great for home use
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my 6 yr old. Her and her 3 yr old sister use it all the time. It's easy for them to pick up and carry around and I don't worry about them falling off it and hurting themselves. I gave it a 4 because it's usage is limited. It's great for walking on and possibly doing a cartwheel but much more than that will be difficult. For now it works.
customer_reviews.author: Mertle

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my little gymnast
customer_reviews.text: My 2 1/2 year old daughter takes gymnastics and wanted to practice at home. Instead of having her use all of our furniture and toys as equipment, I decided to buy her some things to use at home. This beam is perfect for her. It's safe for her to practice on in our house and easy for me to use too to show her how to do different things. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for practicing at home! My daughter loves it! Color is beautiful, and length is great for routine practice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: this was perfect for my 10 year old. she folds it and takes it to the back yard or even to the neighbor's house! would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: LMJ

product_meta.title: Z Athletic Folding Low Balance Beam Gymnastics Children's Multiple Styles and Colors
feature_bullets: PREMIUM QUALITY - Built with high-density firm cross-linked polyethylene foam core gives gymnasts a solid support to perform better because their feet will not sink.

CONFIDENCE BUILDER - At only 2in off the ground, this beam is a perfect confidence builder! New gymnasts can try more moves without fear of a long fall like they’d experience from an Off Ground Balance Beam.

FOLDABLE, PORTABLE, & STORABLE - Beam folds in half for easy handling and storage and its total weight is only 4lbs. Easy to carry and so portable! Take the beam with you or fold and store in seconds.
DIMENSIONS – 9ft long, 2in tall, 4in wide at the top, and 6in wide at the bottom. Having a 6in wide bottom is important to provide extra support while the 4in wide top is competition standard.
SAFE, NON-TOXIC, & EASY TO CLEAN - Lead free and meets all CPSIA standards. This easy to clean high quality synthetic suede is tear resistant and holds up over time and use.
GUARANTEED DURABILITY – This Z-Athletic brand item comes with a 2-Year factory warranty. If your item is damaged during shipping or product is having issues, please contact Z-Athletic directly.
